alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; New Haven (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued July 11 at 12:28PM EDT until July 13 at 8:22AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River At Stevenson Dam. * WHEN...Until Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.5 feet, Water reaches the Maples area of Shelton. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:46 AM EDT Tuesday the stage was 11.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Thursday morning and continue falling to 8.2 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.2 feet on 03/29/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Stevenson Dam Flood Stage: 11.0 Observed Stage at Tue 11 am: 11.5 Forecast: Tue 2 pm 11.4 Tue 8 pm 11.3 Wed 2 am 11.2 Wed 8 am 11.2 Wed 2 pm 11.2 Wed 8 pm 11.1 Thu 2 am 11.1 Thu 8 am 9.5 Thu 2 pm 9.4 Thu 8 pm 9.4 Fri 2 am 9.4 Fri 8 am 8.2 &&
